name: Northern Tales
description: Rise up to the challenge and defeat the hordes of frigid beasts that plan to take over the Earth, as you make your way to the northernmost spot on the globe, all in a ultimate attempt to stop the leader of this invasion force and save the planet from impending doom!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista Processor: 2.5 Ghz Memory: 3 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8 or 10 Processor: 4 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
